module.name: product_occurrence
module.keywords: module, product occurrence, part occurrence, quantified occurrence, function occurrence
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the characterization of occurrences in a product structure, of objects represented with the entity Product and its subtypes.

inscope.li: identification of the occurrence of a product version in a product structure;
relationship of the occurrence of a product version with the definition of this product version it is derived from;
characterization of a product occurrence that is defined from a product specification;
characterization of the quantity of a product occurrence;
identification of the occurrence of a function;
specialization of the concept of product occurrence to represent occurrences of a part.

outscope.li: relationships with the functions or alternative solutions that a product occurrence provides a solution element for;
description of the use case of a part occurrence in a product family.

definition.def: a characterization of the composition of a product. This characterization may be a hierarchical representation where all assembly relationships are explicit or a partly implicit one, where some nodes are not related to a product but to a family of products with relationships conditioned by boolean expressions. In the first approach, a part A would be specified as resulting from the assembly of a part B and a part C. The description of the product structure of products with a huge diversity, like vehicles proposed by major car manufacturers, is usually done using the second approach.

uof.name: Product_Occurrence
uof.description: The Product_Occurrence unit of functionality specifies the data structure for the representation of occurrences of an object represented within an instance of Product, in a product structure.

uof.name: Part_Occurrence
uof.description: The Part_Occurrence unit of functionality specifies the data structure for the representation of occurrences of a part in a product structure.

uof.name: Function_Occurrence
uof.description: The Function_Occurrence unit of functionality specifies the data structure for the representation of occurrences of a function.

alt_map.description: If the Product_occurrence is referred to by at least an Assembly_component_relationship and by no Assembled_part_association.

alt_map.description: If the Quantified_instance is not only used in an assembly This dual mapping enables import processors designed to process only assembly relationship entities to interpret correctly a simple assembly structure.
